being.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a living thing, especially a person
being.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a story about alien beings who invade Earth
being.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the most important quality or nature of something, especially of a person
being.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The whole of her being had been taken over by a desire to return to her homeland.
being.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: used to give the reason for something
being.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Being a quiet sort of person, I didn’t want to get involved.
You can’t expect them to sit still for that long, children being what they are.
